item.title: Toni Rae add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "I pray because I can't help myself. I pray because I'm helpless. I pray because the need flows out of me all the time- waking and sleeping. It doesn't change God- it changes me." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Toni Rae add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
Toni Rae add a quote by William Durant
item.description: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit." -- William Durant

item.title: Toni Rae add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts." -- Aristotle
